Package io.github.ai4ci

Annotation Type Data.Mutable

Enclosing class:
Data
@Target({PACKAGE,TYPE}) @Retention(CLASS) public static @interface Data.Mutable
Mutable value type style for modifiable data structures.

This style configures types that support mutation with:

  • Standard getter patterns: is* for booleans, get* for others
  • Builder initialization with set* methods
  • Constructor creation with new instead of builder
  • Deep immutables detection for nested immutable types
  • with* methods for creating modified copies
  • Automatic toBuilder() implementation
  • Custom hashCode, equals, and toString underrides
  • Pluralization support with custom dictionary

Target Usage: Mutable data structures and configuration objects where immutability is not required.
